mapper.select: select t.mchnt_name, sum(member_card_consume_amt) as member_card_consume_amt, sum(member_card_consume_count) as member_card_consume_count, sum(wx_consume_amt) as wx_consume_amt, sum(wx_consume_count) as wx_consume_count, sum(jf_consume_amt) as jf_consume_amt, sum(jf_consume_count) as jf_consume_count, sum(wx_recharge_upload_amt) as wx_recharge_upload_amt, sum(wx_recharge_trans_amt) as wx_recharge_trans_amt, sum(wx_recharge_count) as wx_recharge_count, sum(jf_recharge_upload_amt) as jf_recharge_upload_amt, sum(jf_recharge_trans_amt) as jf_recharge_trans_amt, sum(jf_recharge_count) as jf_recharge_count, sum(pt_recharge_upload_amt) as pt_recharge_upload_amt, sum(pt_recharge_trans_amt) as pt_recharge_trans_amt, sum(pt_recharge_count) as pt_recharge_count, sum(member_card_bal) as member_card_bal from (select m.mchnt_name as mchnt_name, count(1) as wx_consume_count, sum(t.trans_amt) as wx_consume_amt, 0 as jf_consume_count, 0 as jf_consume_amt, 0 as member_card_consume_count, 0 as member_card_consume_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_count, 0 as wx_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_count, 0 as jf_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_count, 0 as pt_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as member_card_bal from tb_trans_log_his t, tb_intface_trans_log_his i, tb_merchant_inf m where t.dms_related_key = i.interface_primary_key and t.trans_id = i.trans_id and t.mchnt_code = m.mchnt_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and t.trans_id = 'W71' and t.resp_code = '00' and t.trans_st = 1 and t.trans_chnl in ('40001010', '40002001') and t.settle_date >= #{startTime} and t.settle_date <= #{endTime} group by m.mchnt_name union select m.mchnt_name as mchnt_name, 0 as wx_consume_count, 0 as wx_consume_amt, count(1) as jf_consume_count, sum(t.trans_amt) as jf_consume_amt, 0 as member_card_consume_count, 0 as member_card_consume_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_count, 0 as wx_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_count, 0 as jf_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_count, 0 as pt_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as member_card_bal from tb_trans_log_his t, tb_intface_trans_log_his i, tb_merchant_inf m where t.dms_related_key = i.interface_primary_key and t.trans_id = i.trans_id and t.mchnt_code = m.mchnt_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and t.trans_id = 'W71' and t.resp_code = '00' and t.trans_st = 1 and t.trans_chnl = '40004001' and t.settle_date >= #{startTime} and t.settle_date <= #{endTime} group by m.mchnt_name union select m.mchnt_name as mchnt_name, 0 as wx_consume_count, 0 as jf_consume_count, 0 as jf_consume_amt, 0 as wx_consume_amt, count(1) as member_card_consume_count, sum(t.trans_amt) as member_card_consume_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_count, 0 as wx_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_count, 0 as jf_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_count, 0 as pt_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as member_card_bal from tb_trans_log_his t, tb_intface_trans_log_his i, tb_merchant_inf m where t.dms_related_key = i.interface_primary_key and t.trans_id = i.trans_id and t.mchnt_code = m.mchnt_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and t.trans_id = 'W10' and t.resp_code = '00' and t.trans_st = 1 and t.settle_date >= #{startTime} and t.settle_date <= #{endTime} group by m.mchnt_name union select m.mchnt_name as mchnt_name, 0 as wx_consume_count, 0 as wx_consume_amt, 0 as jf_consume_count, 0 as jf_consume_amt, 0 as member_card_consume_count, 0 as member_card_consume_amt, count(1) as wx_recharge_count, sum(t.org_trans_amt) as 0 as pt_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as member_card_bal from tb_trans_log_his t, tb_intface_trans_log_his i, tb_merchant_inf m where t.dms_related_key = i.interface_primary_key and t.trans_id = i.trans_id and t.mchnt_code = m.mchnt_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and t.trans_id = 'W20' and t.resp_code = '00' and t.trans_st = 1 and t.trans_chnl = '40002001' and t.settle_date >= #{startTime} and jf_recharge_upload_amt, sum(t.trans_amt) as jf_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_count, 0 as pt_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as member_card_bal from tb_trans_log_his t, pt_recharge_upload_amt, sum(t.trans_amt) as pt_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as member_card_bal from tb_trans_log_his t, tb_intface_trans_log_his i, tb_merchant_inf m where t.dms_related_key = i.interface_primary_key and t.trans_id = i.trans_id and t.mchnt_code = m.mchnt_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and t.trans_id = 'W20' and t.resp_code = '00' and t.trans_st = 1 and t.trans_chnl = '10001001' and t.settle_date >= #{startTime} and t.settle_date <= #{endTime} group by m.mchnt_name union select m.mchnt_name as mchnt_name, 0 as wx_consume_count, 0 as wx_consume_amt, 0 as jf_consume_count, 0 as jf_consume_amt, 0 as member_card_consume_count, 0 as member_card_consume_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_count, 0 as wx_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_count, 0 as jf_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_count, 0 as pt_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_trans_amt, sum(c.card_bal) as member_card_bal from tb_merchant_inf m, tb_ins_inf i, tb_card_bal c where m.ins_id = i.ins_id and c.ins_code = i.ins_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and c.settle_date = #{endTime} group by m.mchnt_name) t group by mchnt_name

('40001010', '40002001') and t.settle_date >= #{startTime} and t.settle_date <= #{endTime} union select 0 as wx_consume_amt, sum(t.trans_amt) as jf_consume_amt, 0 as member_card_consume_amt, 0 as select sum(attention_count) as attention_count, sum(open_account_count) as open_account_count, sum(open_card_count) as open_card_count from (select count(1) as attention_count, 0 as open_account_count, 0 as open_card_count from tb_wx_client_fans t where t.subscribestatus = '1' and t.createtime >= to_date(#{startTime}||' 000000', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') and t.createtime <= to_date(#{endTime}||' 235959', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') union select 0 as attention_count, count(1) as open_account_count, 0 as open_card_count from tb_user_inf t where t.data_stat = '0' and t.create_time >= to_date(#{startTime}||' 000000', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') and t.create_time <= to_date(#{endTime}||' 235959', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') union select 0 as attention_count, 0 as open_account_count, count(1) as open_card_count from tb_card_inf t, tb_product p, tb_rel_ins_product r, tb_ins_inf i, tb_merchant_inf m where t.product_code = p.product_code and r.product_code = p.product_code and r.ins_id = i.ins_id and m.ins_id = i.ins_id and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and t.create_time >= to_date(#{startTime}||' 000000', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') and t.create_time <= to_date(#{endTime}||' 235959', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') ) t

select m.mchnt_name, count(1) as open_card_count from tb_merchant_inf m, tb_ins_inf i, tb_rel_ins_product p, tb_card_inf t where m.ins_id = i.ins_id and i.ins_id = p.ins_id and p.product_code = t.product_code and m.mchnt_code = #{mchntCode} and t.create_time >= to_date(#{startTime}||' 000000', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') and t.create_time <= to_date(#{endTime}||' 235959', 'YYYYMMDD HH24:MI:SS') group by m.mchnt_name

select m.mchnt_name, count(1) as pt_subsidy_count, sum(t.trans_amt) as pt_subsidy_amt from tb_trans_log_his t, tb_intface_trans_log_his i, tb_merchant_inf m where t.dms_related_key = i.interface_primary_key and t.trans_id = i.trans_id and t.mchnt_code = m.mchnt_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and t.trans_id = 'S20' and t.resp_code = '00' and t.trans_st = 1 and t.settle_date >= #{startTime} and t.settle_date <= #{endTime} group by m.mchnt_name

t.mchnt_code = m.mchnt_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and t.trans_id = 'W71' and t.resp_code = '00' and t.trans_st = 1 and t.trans_chnl in ('40001010', '40002001') and t.settle_date >= #{startTime} <= #{endTime} group by m.mchnt_name union select m.mchnt_name as mchnt_name, 0 as wx_consume_count, 0 as wx_consume_amt, 0 as jf_consume_count, 0 as jf_consume_amt, 0 as member_card_consume_count, 0 as member_card_consume_amt, count(1) as wx_recharge_count, sum(t.org_trans_amt) as wx_recharge_upload_amt, sum(t.trans_amt) as wx_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_count, 0 as jf_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_count, 0 as pt_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as member_card_bal from tb_trans_log_his t, tb_intface_trans_log_his i, tb_merchant_inf m where t.dms_related_key = i.interface_primary_key and t.trans_id = i.trans_id and t.mchnt_code = m.mchnt_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and t.trans_id = 'W20' and t.resp_code = '00' and t.trans_st = 1 and t.trans_chnl = '40002001' and t.settle_date >= #{startTime} and t.settle_date <= #{endTime} group by m.mchnt_name union select m.mchnt_name as mchnt_name, 0 as wx_consume_count, 0 as wx_consume_amt, 0 as jf_consume_count, 0 as jf_consume_amt, 0 as member_card_consume_count, 0 as member_card_consume_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_count, 0 as wx_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_trans_amt, count(1) as jf_recharge_count, sum(t.org_trans_amt) as jf_recharge_upload_amt, sum(t.trans_amt) as jf_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_count, 0 as pt_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as member_card_bal from tb_trans_log_his t, tb_intface_trans_log_his i, tb_merchant_inf m where t.dms_related_key = i.interface_primary_key and t.trans_id = i.trans_id and t.mchnt_code = m.mchnt_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and t.trans_id = 'W20' and t.resp_code = '00' and t.trans_st = 1 and t.trans_chnl = '40004001' and t.settle_date >= #{startTime} and t.settle_date <= #{endTime} group by m.mchnt_name union select m.mchnt_name as mchnt_name, 0 as wx_consume_count, 0 as wx_consume_amt, 0 as jf_consume_count, 0 as jf_consume_amt, 0 as member_card_consume_count, 0 as member_card_consume_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_count, 0 as wx_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_count, 0 as jf_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_trans_amt, count(1) as pt_recharge_count, sum(t.org_trans_amt) as pt_recharge_upload_amt, sum(t.trans_amt) as pt_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as member_card_bal from tb_trans_log_his t, tb_intface_trans_log_his i, tb_merchant_inf m where t.dms_related_key = i.interface_primary_key and t.trans_id = i.trans_id and t.mchnt_code = m.mchnt_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and t.trans_id = 'W20' and t.resp_code = '00' and t.trans_st = 1 and t.trans_chnl = '10001001' and t.settle_date >= #{startTime} and t.settle_date <= #{endTime} group by m.mchnt_name union select m.mchnt_name as mchnt_name, 0 as wx_consume_count, 0 as wx_consume_amt, 0 as jf_consume_count, 0 as jf_consume_amt, 0 as member_card_consume_count, 0 as member_card_consume_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_count, 0 as wx_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as wx_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_count, 0 as jf_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as jf_recharge_trans_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_count, 0 as pt_recharge_upload_amt, 0 as pt_recharge_trans_amt, sum(c.card_bal) as member_card_bal from tb_merchant_inf m, tb_ins_inf i, tb_card_bal c where m.ins_id = i.ins_id and c.ins_code = i.ins_code and m.remarks = 'ACC_ITF' and c.settle_date = #{endTime} group by m.mchnt_name) t group by mchnt_name)
